title: World ranking of professional golf players 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average points for 20 number of Golfers.
The Average points is appeared to be the highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
The highest Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) has 5.17 more Average points than the lowest Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Golfer in the x axis and Average points in the y axis.
The Average points is highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average points for 20 number of Golfers.
The Average points is appeared to be the highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
The highest Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) has 5.17 more Average points than the lowest Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Golfer in the x axis and Average points in the y axis.
The Average points is appeared to be the highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
The second highest Average points is appeared to be the Golfer Jon Rahm (ESP).
The difference of Average points between the highest and lowest Golfer is 5.17.
Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) is higher than any other Golfers with value 9.48, followed by Jon Rahm (ESP), and Brooks Koepka (USA). Down to Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN) with the lowest value 4.31.
The highest value 9.48 at Rory McIlroy (NIR) is almost 1.59 times larger than the average value 5.96.
Summing up the values of all Golfers, we get total 119.27.
